Text:
Next time you upload a torrent, it would be a good idea if you mention in the torrent posting title what the torrent is about.
So very few of our users are mind readers, and the TPB search engine operates on torrent posting titles only.
Yep, very true. That was my first ever torrent so I learned something. Education is good. That's why I redid the torrent and uploaded it as Star_Trek_DS9_S01_DVDRip_(Eaglehorse).
